unnormalised: As per the notification dated 20/07/2024, applications for JEE Advanced coaching at Vidyamandir Classes close on 15/08/2024; eligibility criteria include a minimum of 75% in the Class 12 board exams. Further details are available on www.vidyamandir.com.
normalised: As per the notification dated twentieth july two thousand and twenty four, applications for J-E-E Advanced coaching at Vidyamandir Classes close on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four; eligibility criteria include a minimum of seventy five percent in the Class twelve board exams. Further details are available on w w w dot vidyamandir dot com.
